title: Stones River National Battlefield: Bookstore
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Bookstore            Bookstore          The Stones River National Battlefield bookstore is managed by Eastern National. Visitors can choose from an array of books and other items that contribute to a continuing educational experience. Eastern National makes an annual donation from its sales to Stones River National Battlefield. If you can't make it to the store, located in the visitor center, you can order online or place an order by phone at 615-848-0910. Our store manager is Lisa Barrett.
